thread.title: Loews profit from continuing operations falls 44 pct
thread.title_full: Loews profit from continuing operations falls 44 pct | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Loews profit from continuing operations falls 44 pct
text:
Aug 3 Hotel, energy and financial services conglomerate Loews Corp reported a 44 percent drop in quarterly profit from continuing operations due to lower revenue from its Diamond Offshore Drilling Inc subsidiary and insurance business.
The company's income from continuing operations fell to $170 million, or 46 cents per share, in the second quarter ended June 30 from $303 million, or 79 cents per share, a year earlier.
(Reporting by Neha Dimri in Bengaluru; Editing by Ted Kerr )
